name: Legendelver
description:
Gameplay:

  • Click cards to use them
  • Drag cards left and right to see the rest of your hand
  • Sorry for any bugs

The other bits:

Legendelver is a card game where you explore (or 'delve' into) the stories of the legendary cards in your hand.

I always thought it was rubbish how 'legendary' items in games either had no legend to go with them, or the legend sounded more fun than the actual game. Legendelver aims to change that.
